task.name: importuvfits
task.shortdescription: Convert a UVFITS file to a CASA visibility data set
task.description: Convert a UVITS file to a CASA visiblity data set. Don\'t forget to flag autocorrelations using taskname flagdata, autocorr = true

param.name: fitsfile
param.description: Name of input UV FITS file

param.name: antnamescheme
param.description: For VLA only; \'new\' or \'old\'; \'VA04\' or \'04\' for VLA ant 4

task.example:
Convert a UVFITS file to a CASA visibility data set:
Keyword arguments: fitsfile -- Name of input UV FITS file default: none; example='3C273XC1.fits' vis -- Name of output visibility file (MS) default: none; example: vis='3C273XC1.ms' async -- Run asynchronously default = false; do not run asychronously
Note: Don't forget to flag autocorrections using taskname flagdata, autocorr = true
